name: Mary Glann
description: I am Mary Glann by name.I am a very considerate and down to earth type of person that loves to enjoy life and all that it has to offer.I enjoy a variety of different activities,from relaxing at home watching a movie to things that an’re definitely more adventurous.31 years old Hair:Black Height:5’8"Eyes:Brown…I love reading novels as well as cooking.I also like to hang out with my loved one as well I am looking for real man who is loving and caring and ready for a family.I need a man who is ready to love me 100%just as much as I am ready to give him my love
